description:
Formal request for a Scoping Opinion under Regulation 5 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2011. The proposed redevelopment seeks to provide a residential-led mixed use development (approximately 18,000sqm) incorporating up to 160 residential apartments (Use Class C3); a commercial unit (approximately 150sqm) and ancillary non-residential space including energy centre (approximately 200sqm) is also proposed at ground floors level, with ancillary and associated development including access, 
disabled parking provision, servicing and landscaping. Note that the application proposes development within a designated Site of Importance for Nature Conservation (SINC), (designated by the LPA as being of 'borough grade 1 importance'). Indicative loss of SINC is currently estimated to be 15% (1,723sqm) of the existing 12,068sqm of SINC within the site.
